523040.name: Edge of Twilight – Ultimate Collector's Edition
523040.description:
To reward our fans for their support and patience, we are offering an Ultimate Collector’s Edition of Edge of Twilight. This version contains the upcoming releases of the Edge of Twilight series! Get the rest of the Edge of Twilight story when you choose the Ultimate Collector’s Edition.

In addition to the complete story, the Ultimate Collector’s Edition includes the original Edge of Twilight soundtrack, which contains selected tracks from the ambient, steampunkish music that fueled you through the game. This option is your best accompaniment if you’re planning to purchase Edge of Twilight – Return to Glory. A copy of the original music file (in OGG format) included in the package. You can play all tracks with your own favorite music player.

- Six additional chapters, adding 30+ hours gameplay to Edge of Twilight*
- New skills and weapons*
- New ultimate bosses*
- Original soundtrack. Music performed by a professional string quartet. Soundtrack produced and recorded by the industry’s top audio studio and producers
- Bonus content, only available for this DLC

* Will automatic update to you when become available.

Current Track list:
- Spoken Words 1
- On My Way
- Tainted Gemini
- Spoken Words 2
- Nexus
- Athern Swan
- Ether Provoker
- Spoken Words 3
- Battleworn Antihero
- Ruined Fanfare
- The Giant’s Duel
- Blood in the Night

Bonus track:
- Lithern Tears
- Someone Special

more track will be added to the list soon...
523040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
